about_the_game:
Zombies come back to life,
play as a guard or zombie and fight for precious brains to decide the fate of humanity.

Zombie Rush is Free to Play a team vs team mode,
Survivors need to protect the Big Brain from the Zombies. If you keep the brain safe for the length of the match you win the game.
Zombies need to eat the Big Brain, work with your team and organize the perfect swarm! To eat the brain you must first destroy the protective dome of glass.

Zombie Rush includes a new game mode and 6 new unique classes with different abilities,
  • Runner
  • Acid
  • Smoke
  • Tank
  • Meat
  • Fat

name: Of Guards and Thieves - Zombie Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 compatible
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Zombies come back to life, play as a guard or zombie and fight for precious brains to decide the fate of humanity.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Norwegian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
